Translations.Text: Ibraahime ka’le, ‘he praeraita phiraistasakala! Tomalokara bisesa kama ki’
Te'omloke ka’le, ‘niscaya ami eta aparaadhi sampradayara prati praeraita haicho’
Sihamtara oparata paka matira tukuraa niksepa karaibalai
yito tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa cihnita simalanghanakaraisakalara babe
Arau tata yisakala mumina achila ami sihamtaka uliya'i anicho
Kintu ami tata eta paraiyalara bahirae ana kono muchalima poraa na'i
Arau yisakale yantranadayaka sastika bhaya karae ami sihamtara babe tata eta nidarsana thai ahicho
Arau muchara kahinito nidarsana ache, yetiya ami te'omka suspasta pramanasaha phira'a'unara ocarata pathiya'ichilo
kintu si ksamatara ahankarata mukha ghuraa'i la’le arau ka’le, ‘e'om ejana yadukara naha’le unmada’
Phalata ami taka arau tara sain'ya bahinika sasti bihilo arau sihamtaka sagarata niksepa karailo arau si achila tiraskrta
Arau nidarsana ache ada sampradayara ghatanato, (smarana karaa) yetiya ami sihamtara biraud'dhe akalyanakara bataha praerana karaichilo
se'i batahajaka ekorae eraa nachila, yara oparaedi gaichila taka curna-bicurna karai gaichila
Arau nidarsana ache chamuda sampradayara ghatanato, yetiya sihamtaka koraa haichila, ‘eta nirdista samaya laike bhoga karai loraa’
Kintu sihamte sihamtara pratipalakara adesa manibalai ahankara karaile; phalata sihamta ca'i thaka arasthate sihamtaka bajrapate dharaile
Phalata sihamte thiya ha’balaike'o saksama naha’la arau pratiraodho karaiba noraaraile
Arau (dhbansa karaichilo) iyara agata nuhara sampradayaka, niscaya sihamta achila phachikba sampradaya
Arau ami amara ksamatara balata akasa nirmana karaicho arau niscaya ami mahasamprasaranakarai
Arau ami prthiraikhanaka parai dicho, (coraacona, ami) kimana sundara byarasthapanakarai
arau ami pratito bastu yoraa yoraa srsti karaicho, yate tomaloke upadesa grahana karaa
Eteke tomaloke allahara phale dharaita horaa, niscaya ma'i kerala te'omra taraphara paraa ejana spasta satarkakarai
Arau tomaloke allahara lagata ana kono ilaha nirdharana nakaraiba; niscaya ma'i kerala te'omra taraphara paraa ejana spasta satarkakarai
E'idarae sihamtara purbarartisakalara majata yetiya'i kono raachula ahiche, sihamte'i kaiche, ‘e'om ejana yadukara naha’le unmada’
Sihamte ijane sijanaka e'i bisaye achiyata karaiche neki? Baram sihamta simalanghanakarai sampradaya
Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa, tomara kono dosa naha’ba
Arau tumi upadesa di thaka, karana niscaya upadesa muminasakalara upakarata ahe
Arau ma'i jina arau manuhaka kerala e'i babe'i srsti karaicho ye, sihamta kerala morae'i ibadata karaiba
Ma'i sihamtara paraa kono jiraika nibicarao arau ma'i e'ito'o nibicarao ye, sihamte moka khuraaba
Niscaya allahe'i jiraikadata, prabala saktidhara, paraakramasali
Eteke yihamte an'yaya karaiche sihamtara babe ache sihamtara samamatalambisakalara darae praapya (sasti); gatike sihamte kharakheda karaiba nalage
Eteke yihamte kupharai karaiche sihamtara babe se'idinara dhbansa, yi dinatora bisaye sihamtaka satarka karaa haiche
Sapata tura parbatara
sapata kitabara yito lipibad'dha ache
unmukta patata
Sapata abada grhara
sapata su'ucca cadara
sapata taranga-biksubdha uttala sagarara
niscaya tomara pratipalakara sasti arasyambharai
iyara pratiraodhakarai kono na'i
Yidina prabalabharae akasakhana prakampita ha’ba
arau parbatasamuha drautagatita paraibhramana karaiba
eteke sarbanasa se'idina asbikarakaraisakalara babe
yihamte khela-dhemalira chalanarae asara karmata lipta thake
Se'idina sihamtaka jahannamara ju'ira phale theli-heci lai yoraa ha’ba
‘e'itorae se'i jahannama yaka tomaloke asbikara karaichila’
E'ito yadu neki? Ne tomaloke dekha noporaa
Tomaloke ju'ita praraesa karaa, tara pichata tomaloke dhairya dharana karaa ba nakaraa ubhaye'i tomalokara babe samana. Tomaloke yi karaichila tarae'i pratiphala tomalokaka diya haiche
Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba jannatata arau praacuryara bhitarata
te'omlokara pratipalake te'omlokaka yi pradana karaiche seya te'omloke upabhoga karaiba arau te'omlokara pratipalake te'omlokaka raksa karaiba jbalanta agnira sastira paraa
‘tomaloke yi amala karaichila tara binimayata tomaloke trpti sahakarae khoraa arau pana karaa’
Te'omloke sraenibad'dhabharae susajjita asanata a'uji bahiba; arau ami te'omlokara milana ghatama mrganayani danara caku bisista hurara lagata

arau yisakale imana aniche arau te'omlokara santana-santati'o imanata te'omlokara anugami haiche, ami te'omlokara lagata te'omlokara santana-santatika ekatraita karaima, arau te'omlokara karmaphala ami alapo hraasa nakaraima; pratyeka byaktiye'i nija krtakarmara babe dayi
Arau ami te'omlokaka atiraikta pradana karaima phala-mula arau mansa yito te'omloke kamana karaiba
Tata te'omloke parasparae panapatra adana-pradana karaiba, tata kono nirarthaka katha-bataraa nathakiba arau kono papa kama'o nathakiba
Arau tata te'omlokara seraata carai'ophale ghurai thakiba kisorasakalara dala; sihamta dekhata yena suraksita mukuta
Arau te'omloke ijane sijanara phale ca'i sudhiba
te'omloke ka’ba, ‘niscaya ami iti purbe amara paraiyala bargara majata sankita arasthata achilo’
Tara pichata allahe amara prati anugraha karaiche arau amaka ju'ira sastira paraa raksa karaiche
Niscaya ami agate'o te'omke'i ahbana karaichilo; niscaya te'om krpamaya, parama dayalu
Eteke tumi upadesa di thaka, karana tomara pratipalakara anugrahata tumi ganako nahaya arau unmado nahaya
Sihamte kaya neki ye, e'om (muham'mada) ejana kabi? Ami tara mrtyura pratiksa karaicho
Koraa, ‘tomaloke apeksa karaa, mayo tomalokara lagata pratiksakaraisakalara antarbhukta ha’lo’
Sihamtara bibeka-bud'dhiye sihamtaka e'i adesa diye neki? Ne sihamta simalanghanakarai sampradaya
ne sihamte kaya, ‘e'i kora'ana e'om nije'i racana karaiche’? Baram sihamta imana naniba
Tente sihamte yadi satyabadi, tetiyaha’le sihamte iyara darae kono bani lai ahakacona
sihamte srastabihina srsti haiche neki, ne sihamta nije'i srasta
ne sihamte akasamandala arau prthirai srsti karaiche? Baram sihamte drrha bisbasa nakarae
Tomara pratipalakara gopana bhandara sihamtara ocarate neki, ne sihamte'i sakalo bastura niyantranakarai
ne sihamtara ocarata mai ache, ya’ta araohana karai sihamte (urd'dhajagatara katha) sunibalai paya? Tente sihamte suna se'i spasta pramanato lai ahakacona
ne kan'ya santana te'omra babe; arau putra santana tomalokara babe
tumi sihamtara ocarata pratidana bicaraa neki ye, sihamte iyaka eta durbaha boja buli bhabe
ne sihamtara ocarata adrsyara jnana ache, yito sihamte likhe
ne sihamte kono sarayantra karaiba bicarae? Eteke yihamte kupharai karae sihamte'i ha’ba sarayantrara cikara
Ne allahara bahirae sihamtara kono ilaha ache? Sihamte yi sbirka karae tara paraa allaha paraitra
Arau akasara kono tukuraa bhani paraa dekhile'o sihamte ka’ba, ‘e'ito eta punjibhuta megha’
Eteke sihamtaka erai diya se'idina paryanta, yidina sihamta bajraaghatata akraanta ha’ba
Se'idina sihamtara sarayantra kono kamata nahiba arau sihamtaka sahaya'o karaa naha’ba
Arau niscaya yihamte an'yaya karaiche sihamtara babe ache iyara bahirae'o arau sasti. Kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i e'i katha najane

Arau tumi tomara pratipalakara sid'dhantara oparata dhairya dharana karaa; karana tumi amara cukura sanmukhate acha. Tumi tomara pratipalakara prasansara saite paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa yetiya tumi thiya horaa
Arau te'omra paraitrata ghosana karaa nisara bhagata arau taraabora astamita horaara pichata
Sapata naksatrara, yetiya i astamita haya
tomalokara sangi bibhraanta horaa na'i, arau bipathagami'o nahaya
arau te'om mane saja katha nakaya
Eya kerala ahi, yito te'omra prati ahiraupe praerana karaa haya
te'omka siksa diche prabala saktidhara
saundaryapurna satta. Tara pichata te'om sthira haichila
arau te'om achila urd'dhadigantata
tara pichata te'om nikatararti ha’la, eteke nikatararti ahila
phalata te'omra majata dukhana dhenura duratba ra’la, athaba tatokai kama
Tetiya allahe te'omra bandara prati yi ahi karaibalagiya seya ahi karaile
Yi te'om dekhiche, te'omra antarae se'i samparke micha koraa na'i
te'om yi dekhiche, se'i samparke tomaloke te'omra lagata bitarka karaiba neki
arau niscaya te'om te'omka arau ebara dekhichila
Chidaraatula munatahara ocarata
yara ocarata jannatula ma’oraa arasthita
Yetiya chidaraa'i yi acchadita karaara seya acchadita karaichila
te'omra drsti bibhrama horaa na'i, arau sima'o atikrama karaa na'i
Niscaya te'om nija pratipalakara mahana nidarsanaralira kichumana dekhichila
eteke tomaloke lata arau ujjha samparke ki koraa
arau trtiya ana eta manata samparke
eya ki katha, tomalokara babe putra arau arau allahara babe kan'ya santana
teneha’le eya eta asangata bantana

E'ibora kichumana namara bahirae ana eko nahaya, yibora nama tomaloke arau tomalokara pitrpurausasakale raakhiche, yara samarthanata allahe kono dalila-pramana aratirna karaa na'i. Sihamte kerala anumana arau nijara prabrttirae'i anusarana karae, athaca sihamtara ocarata sihamtara pratipalakara taraphara paraa hidayata ahiche
Manuhe yi bicarae se'itorae si paya ne
prakrtate akhiraata arau duniya allaharae'i
Arau akasasamuhata asankhya phiraista ache, sihamtara madhyasthata kono kamata nahiba, kintu allahe yaka iccha karae arau yara prati te'om santusta haya tara babe anumati diyara pichata
Niscaya yihamte akhiraataka bisbasa nakarae, sihamte'i phiraistasakalaka naraibacaka namerae namakarana karae
athaca e'i bisaye sihamtara kono jnane'i na'i. Sihamta kerala anumanara anusarana karae; arau niscaya anumana satyara mukabilata kono kamata nahe
Eteke tumi se'i byaktika upeksa karaa, yiye amara smaranara paraa bimukha haya arau akala prthiraira jiranake'i kamana karae
E'itorae sihamtara jnanara sesa sima. Niscaya tomara pratipalaka, teraemi ata'itakai bhala jane kona te'omra pathara paraa bicyuta haiche arau teraemi bhala jane kona hidayatapraapta haiche

Arau akasamandalata yi ache arau prthiraita yi ache sakalo allaharae'i. Yate te'om sihamtara kamara pratiphala diba parae yihamte beya kama karae arau yate se'isakala lokaka uttama puraskara diba parae yisakale satkarma karae

yisakale sarau-suraa dosa-trautira bahirae danara danara papa arau aslila karyakalapara paraa birata thake. Niscaya tomara pratipalakara ksama aparaisima; te'om tomalokara bisaye samyaka aragata—(smarana karaa) yetiya te'om tomalokaka matira paraa srsti karaichila arau yetiya tomaloka matrgarbhata bhraunaraupe achila. Eteke tomaloke atmaprasansa nakaraiba, kone takbaraa aralambana karaiche se'i bisaye teraemi samyaka aragata
Tumi se'i byaktika dekhichane, yiye mukha ghuraa'i laiche
arau kincita dana karaile arau bandha karai dile
tara ocarata kiba gayebara jnana ache neki, yito si pratyaksa karae
ne muchara chahiphata yi ache, se'i samparke taka arahita karaa horaa na'i
arau ibraahimara chahiphata, yijane purna karaichila (te'omra angikara)
seya haiche ye, kono boja bahanakaraiye anara boja bahana nakaraiba
arau e'i ye, manuhe se'itorae paya, yito si cesta karae
arau tara pracestara phala atisighrae'i dekhuraa ha’ba
tara pichata taka purna pratiphala pradana karaa ha’ba
arau niscaya tomara pratipalakara ocarate'i haiche sesa gantabya
arau niscaya teraemi hahuraaya arau teraemi kanduraaya
arau niscaya teraemi mrtyu pradana karae arau teraemi jirana dana diye
arau niscaya teraemi srsti karaiche yora-yorakai purausa arau narai
sukrabindura paraa, yetiya i skhalita haya
arau niscaya punaraut'thana ghatoraara dayitba'o te'omrae'i
arau niscaya teraemi abharamukta karae arau sampada pradana karae
arau niscaya teraemi asba-sbi’raa naksatrara pratipalaka
Arau teraemi praacina ‘ada jatika dhbansa karaiche
arau chamuda jatiko (dhbansa karaiche). Sihamtara ejanako arasista rakha na'i
Arau iyara purbe nuhara sampradayako (teraemi dhbansa karaiche). Niscaya sihamta achila atisaya yalima arau carama abadhya
Arau teraemi olota'i diya abasabhumika niksepa karaichila
tara pichata se'ito acchanna karaichila yi acchanna karaibalagiya achila
Eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara konato anugraha samparke sandeha posana karaiba
atitata satarkakaraisakalara darae'i e'i nabi'o ejana satarkakarai
Kiyamata nikatararti
Allahara bahirae kone'o iyaka prakasa karaibalai saksama nahaya
Tomaloke e'i kathata bismaya bodha karaicha neki
arau hamhi-thatraa karaicha! Kanda na'i
arau tomaloke udasina
eteke tomaloke allahaka chajada karaa arau te'omra ibadata karaa
Kiyamata nikatararti haiche arau candra bidirna haiche
arau sihamte kono nidarsana dekhile mukha ghuraa'i laya arau kaya, ‘eyato ciraacaraita yadu’
Arau sihamte asbikara karae arau nija nija prabrttira anusarana karae, athaca pratito bisaye'i sesa laksyata upanita ha’ba
Arau sihamtara ocarata sambadasamuha ahi pa'iche, ya’ta ache satarkabani
eta paraipurna hikamata, kintu bhitipradarsana sihamtara kono kamata aha na'i
Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa. (Smarana karaa) yidina ahbanakaraiye ahbana karaiba eta bhayaraha parainamara phale
apamanita aranamita nayanerae se'idina sihamte kabarara paraa ola'i ahiba, ene lagiba yena sihamta biksipta pharainahe
sihamte ahbanakaraira phale bhita-santrasta arasthata guci ahiba. Kaphirasakale ka’ba, ‘e'ito bara kathina dina’
Ihamtara purbe nuhara sampradaye'o asbikara karaichila-- eteke sihamte amara bandaka asbikara karaichila arau kaichila, ‘e'om ejana baliya’, arau te'omka bhiti pradarsana karaa haichila
Tetiya te'om nija pratipalakaka ahbana karai kaichila, ‘niscaya ma'i asahaya, eteke tumiye'i iyara pratisodha grahana karaa’
Phalata ami dharaasara barasunasaha akasara duraarasamuha khuli dilo
arau matira paraa jharnasamuha utsaraita karailo; phalata gote'i pani milita ha’la eta paraikalpana anusarae
Arau ami taka (nuhaka) katha arau peraeka nirmita nauyanata araohana karaalo
Yito amara cakura sanmukhata calichila, e'ito puraskara tara babe yaka pratyakhyana karaa haichila
Arau niscaya ami iyaka nidarsanaraupe raakhi dicho; eteke achene konoba upadesa grahanakarai
eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
ada sampradaye'o asbikara karaichila, eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
Niscaya ami sihamtara oparata pathiya'ichilo pracanda sitala dhumuha nirabicchinna amangala dinata
se'i dhumuha'i manuhaka utkhata karaichila, yena sihamta ughali paraa khejura gachara kanda
Eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
chamuda sampradaye'o satarkakaraisakalaka asbikara karaichila
Arau sihamte kaichila, ‘ami amara majarae'i ejana byaktira anusarana karaima neki? Eneha’le ami pathabhrastatata arau unmattatata patita hama
Amara majara paraa e'omra prati upadesabani praerana karaa haiche neki? Nahaya, si ejana michaliya, dambhika’
Ahakali niscaya sihamte gama paba, kona carama michaliya, dambhika
Niscaya ami sihamtara babe paraiksasbaraupa uta patha'i acho, eteke tumi sihamtara bisaye apeksa karaa arau dhairyadharana karaa
Arau sihamtaka jana'i diya ye, sihamtara majata pani bantana sunirdista. Pratyeke'i nijara pala mate panira ansata upasthita ha’ba
Tara pichata sihamte sihamtara sangika mati anile arau si utajanika dharai hatya karaile
Eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
niscaya ami sihamtara prati pathiya'ichilo eta pracanda sabda, phalata sihamta gohali saja sukana khandita kharaira darae hai ga’la
Arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
luta sampradaye'o satarkakaraisakalaka asbikara karaichila
Niscaya ami sihamtara oparata sila bahanakarai pracanda dhumuha pathiya'ichilo, kerala luta paraiyalara bahirae; te'omlokaka ami ud'dhara karaichilo raatira sesansata
amara phalara paraa anugrahasbaraupa. Yiye krtajnata prakasa karae, ami taka enekaiye pratidana di'om
Arau niscaya lute sihamtaka amara kathina sastira paraa satarka karaichila, tathapi'o sihamte saradhana bani samparke sandeha posana karaichila
Arau niscaya sihamte lutara paraa te'omra atithisakalara paraa asat uddesya dabi karaile, tetiya ami sihamtara drsti lopa karai dilo (arau ka’lo), mora sasti arau saradhana banira soraada loraa
Arau niscaya puraa dokamukalite sihamtara oparata biraamahina sasti nami ahichila
‘Eteke mora sasti arau saradhana banira parainama bhoga karaa’
Arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
arau niscaya phira'a'una gosthira ocarato satarkakarai ahichila
sihamte amara sakalo nidarsanake asbikara karaile, eteke ami mahaparaakramasali arau sarbasaktimanaraupe sihamtaka dharailo
Tomalokara majara kaphirasakala se'isakala kaphiratakai uttama neki? Ne tomalokara babe purbararti kitabata kono muktira ghosana ache
ne sihamte kaya, ‘ami sanghabad'dha aparaajaya dala’
e'i dala anatipalame paraajita ha’ba arau pitha dekhuraa'i palayana karaiba
baram kiyamata sihamtara sastira nirdharaita samaya; arau kiyamata haiche ati bhayaraha arau tiktakara
niscaya aparaadhisakala bibhraanti arau sastita ache
Yidina sihamtaka naka comcaraa'i tani jahannamata lai yoraa ha’ba (se'i dina koraa ha’ba) ‘etiya jahannamara sparsa bhoga karaa’
Niscaya ami pratito bastu eta nirdharaita paraimapata srsti karaicho
Arau amara adesa kerala eta katha, cakura palakara darae
Arau ami tomalokara darae bahutake dhbansa karaicho; eteke upadesa grahanakarai konoba achene
arau sihamte yi karaiche, se'i sakalo ‘amalanamata’ (lipibad'dha) ache
arau sakalo sarau-bara katha likhita ache
Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba baga-bagica arau nijaraasamuhara majata
yathayogya asanata, sarbasaktimana maha adhipati (allaha)ra sannidhyata
Ara-raahamana, (dayamaya allaha)
teraemi siksa diche kora'ana
teraemi srsti karaiche manuha
teraemi taka bhasa sika'iche
Surya arau candra nirdharaita hicapa anuyayi arartana karae
arau trnalata arau brksadiye chajada karae
arau teraemi akasakhanaka samunnata karaiche arau sthapana karaiche tulacani
yate tomaloke jokha-makhata simalanghana nakaraa
Arau tomaloke n'yayasangatabharae ojana pratistha karaa arau ojanakrta bastu kama nidiba
Arau prthiraikhanaka te'om srsti jirara babe sthapana karaiche
ya’ta ache phala-mula arau khejura gacha, yara phala araranamukta
arau ache bakaliyukta dana arau sugandhiyukta phula
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
teraemi manuhaka srsti karaiche pani misraita sukana matira paraa yito poraa matira darae
arau teraemi jinaka srsti karaiche dhomraabihina agnisikhara paraa
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
teraemi du'i udayacala arau du'i astacalara pratipalaka
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
teraem du'i sagaraka prabahita karae, ubhaye paraspara milita haya
kintu sihamta ubhayara majata ache eta antaraala, yito sihamte atikrama karaiba noraarae

eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
tata thakiba sbamira prati drsti simitakarai raupahisakala, yisakalaka itipurbe kono manuhe athaba kono jine sparsa karaa na'i
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba

Yetiya kiyamata sanghatita ha’ba
(tetiya) iyara sanghatanara asbikarakarai kono nathakiba
I karaobaka adhahpatana karaiba, karaobaka samunnata karaiba
yetiya prthirai prabala prakampanerae prakampita ha’ba
arau parbatasamuha curna-bicurna hai paraiba
phalata se'ibora biksipta dhulikanata parainata ha’ba
arau tomaloke bibhakta hai paraiba tinita dalata
eteke somphalara dala; arau somphalara dalato kimana ye saubhagyabana
arau ba'omphalara dala; arau ba'omphalara dalato kimana ye durbhagiya
arau agragamisakale'i agragami
te'omloke'i sannidhyapraapta
te'omloka thakiba niyamatapurna jannatasamuhata
bahusankhyaka ha’ba purbarartisakalara majara paraa
arau kama sankhyaka ha’ba parabartisakalara majara paraa
Sonerae nirmita asanamuhata
sihamte parasparae mukhamukhikai a'uji bahiba
Sihamtara ase-pase ghuraiphuraiba cira kisorasakale
prabahita nijaraara suraapurna panapatra arau piyalabora lai
se'i suraa pana karaile te'omlokara mura nughuraaya arau te'omloka jnanaharaa'o naha’ba
arau (ghuraiphuraiba) te'omlokara pachandaniya phala-mula lai
arau te'omlokara rauci anuyayi caraa'ira mansa lai
Arau te'omlokara babe thakiba mrganayani (danara cakubisista) hura
yeniba sihamta suraksita mukutahe
sihamte yi amala karaichila tara puraskarasbaraupa
Tata sihamte kono alagatiyala katha arau kono papabakya sunibalai napaba
suniba kerala chalama arau chalama
Arau somphalara dala; kimana ye bhagyabana somphalara dalato
Te'omloke thakiba ene udyanata, ya’ta ache kamitabihina bagarai gacha
arau thokerae bharaa kala gacha
arau samprasaraita cham
arau sadaya prabahamana pani
arau pracura phala-mula
yibora sesa naha'ba arau nisid'dha'o naha’ba
Arau (sihamta thakiba) su'ucca sayyasamuhata
niscaya ami sihamtaka (hurasakalaka) srsti karaicho bisesaraupata
tara pichata sihamtaka kumarai bana'icho
nija sbamira prati asakta arau samabayasiya
somphalara lokasakalara babe
Sihamtara bechibhage'i ha'ba purbarartilokasalara majara paraa
arau bahusankhyaka ha'ba parabartisakalara majara paraa
Arau ba'omphalara dala, kimana ye durbhagiya ba'omphalara dalato
sihamta thakiba atyanta usna bayu arau uttapta utala panita
arau ati ka'la dhomraara chamta
yito sitalo nahaya arau araamadayako nahaya
Niscaya sihamta itipurbe bhoga-bilasata magna achila
arau sihamta abiraama lipta achila jaghan'ya papa kamata
Arau sihamte kaichila, ‘ami yetiya marai mati arau harata parainata hama tetiya'o amaka punaraut'thita karaa ha’bane’
arau amara pitrpurausasakalako (uthoraa ha’bane)
koraa, ‘niscaya purbarartisakalako arau parabartisakalako
sakaloke ekatraita karaa ha’ba eta nirdharaita dinara nirdista samayata’
Tara pichata, he bibhraanta asbikarakaraisakala
niscaya ahara karaiba yakkuma gachara paraa
se'itorae'i tomaloke peta bharaaba
taduparai tara oparata pana karaiba uttapta utala pani
tara pichata tomaloke trsnatura utara darae se'i pani pana karaiba
Pratiphala dirasata e'itorae ha’ba sihamtara apyayana
Amiye'i tomalokaka srsti karaicho; teneha’le kiya tomaloke bisbasa nakaraa
tomaloke bhabichane tomalokara biryapata samparke
se'ito tomaloke srsti karaa, ne ami srsti karao
amiye'i tomalokara majata mrtyu nirdharana karaicho arau ami aksama naha'om
tomalokara sthanata tomalokara sadrsa anibalai arau tomalokaka ene eta akrtita srsti karaibalai yito tomaloke najana
Arau niscaya tomaloke aragata haicha prathama srsti samparke, tente kiya tomaloke upadesa grahana nakaraa
tomaloke yi bija simca se'i bisaye tomaloke bhabi ca'ichane
se'ito tomaloke ankuraita karaa, ne ami ankuraita karao
ami iccha karaile iyaka khera-kutata parainata karaiba parao, tetiya tomaloke hatasa hai paraiba
(e'i buli) ‘niscaya ami dayagrasta hai parailo’
‘baram ami bancita haicho’
Tomaloke yi pani pana karaa se'i samparke koraacona
meghara paraa se'ito tomaloke nama'i ana, ne ami se'ito barsana karao
ami iccha karaile se'ito luniya karai diba parao. Tathapi'o kiya tomaloke krtajnata prakasa nakaraa
tomaloke yi ju'i jbaloraa se'i bisaye koraacona
tomaloke iyara gacha srsti karaa, ne ami srsti karao
iyaka ami karaicho eta smaraka arau maraubhumitabasa karaa lokara prayojaniya bastu
Eteke tumi tomara mahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa
Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho naksatraraajira astacalara
arau niscaya e'ito eta mahasapata, yadi tomaloke janilahemtena
niscaya e'ito mahimanbita kora'ana
yito ache suraksita kitabata (lipibad'dha)
Paraitrasakalara bahirae ana konorae iyaka sparsa karaiba noraarae
E'ito srstijagatara pratipalakara paraa aratirna
Tathapi'o tomaloke e'i banika tuccha buli bhabicha neki
arau tomaloke asbikara karaake'i tomalokara jiraika karai laicha
eteke kiya nahaya—praana yetiya kanthagata haya
arau tetiya tomaloke (asahaya hai) ca'i thaka
arau ami tomalokatakai'o tara bechi ocarata thako, kintu tomaloke dekha noporaa
Eteke yadi tomaloke hicapa-nikaca arau pratiphalara sanmukhina nohoraa
teneha'le tomaloke se'ito (atmato) ghuraa'i nana kiya? Yadi tomaloke satyabadi
tara pichata si yadi naikatyapraaptasakalara ejana haya
tente tara babe thakiba bisraama, uttama jiranopakarana arau sukhamaya jannata
Arau si yadi haya somphalara dalara ejana
tente (taka koraa ha’ba) ‘tomara prati chalama’, yihetu tumi somphalara ejana
Kintu si yadi haya asbikarakarai, bibhraantasakalara ejana
tente tara atithya karaa ha’ba utala panira dbaraa
arau jahannamara dahanerae
niscaya e'ito suniscita satya
Eteke tumi tomara mahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa
Akasamandala arau prthiraita yi ache sakalorae allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karae; arau te'om paraakramasali, prajnamaya
Akasamandala arau prthiraira sarbamaya kartrtba te'omrae'i; teraemi jirana dana karae arau teraemi mrtyu pradana karae; arau teraemi sakalo bastura oparata ksamatabana
Teraemi adi arau anta; prakasya (oparata) arau gopana (ocarata) arau teraemi sakalo bastu samparke samyaka aragata

Teraemi akasasamuha arau prthirai chaya dinata srsti karaiche; tara pichata te'om arasbara oparata uthiche. Te'om jane yi bhugarbhata praraesa karae arau yi bhugarbhara paraa olaya, arau akasara paraa yi aratirna haya arau yi akasalai uthi yaya; arau tomaloka ya’te'i nathaka kiya-- te'om tomalokara lagata ache, arau tomaloke yi karaa se'i samparke allaha samyaka drasta
Akasamandala arau prthiraira sakalo kartrtba te'omrae'i arau allahara phale'i sakalo bisaya pratyabartita haya
Teraemi raatika dinara bhitarata praraesa karaaya arau dinaka raatira bhitarata praraesa karaaya; arau teraemi antarara bisayasamuha samparke samyaka aragata

Tomaloke allaha arau te'omra raachulara prati imana ana arau allahe tomalokaka yi sampadara uttaraadhikarai karaiche tara paraa byaya karaa. Eteke tomalokara majata yisakale imana posana karae arau (allahara pathata) byaya karae te'omlokara babe ache mahapuraskara

Arau tomalokara ki ha’la, tomaloke allahara prati bisbasa nakaraa kiya? Athaca raachule tomalokaka tomalokara pratipalakara prati imana anibalai ahbana karaiche, arau allahe'o tomalokara paraa angikara grahana karaiche, yadi tomaloke mumina horaa
Teraemi nija bandara prati suspasta ayatasamuha aratirna karae, tomalokaka andhakarara paraa poharalai anara babe; arau niscaya allaha tomalokara prati karaunamaya, parama dayalu

Arau tomalokara ki ha’la, tomaloke allahara pathata kharaca nakaraa kiya? Athaca akasamandala arau prthiraira miraacha kerala allaharae'i. Tomalokara majata yisakale bijayara agata byaya karaiche arau yud'dha karaiche, te'omloka (arau parabartisakala) samana nahaya. Te'omloka sihamtatakai maryadata sraestha yisakale parabarti samayata byaya karaiche arau yud'dha karaiche. Kintu allahe ubhayara babe'i kalyanara pratisrauti diche; arau tomaloke yi amala karaa se'i samparke allaha sabisesa aragata
Enekuraa kona ache, yiye allahaka uttama rna diba? Teneha’le te'om tara babe iyaka bahugune brd'dhi karai diba arau tara babe ache sanmanajanaka puraskara

Se'idina tumi mumina nara-naraisakalaka dekhibalai paba ye, te'omlokara sanmukhata arau som phale te'omlokara nura daurai ache. (Koraa ha’ba) ‘aji tomalokara babe susambada haiche jannata, yara talata nadisamuha prabahita, tata tomaloka cirasthayi ha’ba, e'itorae'i mahasaphalata’

Se'idina munaphika purausa arau munaphika naraisakale imandarasakalaka ka’ba, ‘tomaloke amara babe alapa apeksa karaa, yate tomalokara nurara paraa ami alapa grahana karaiba parao’. Koraa ha’ba, ‘tomaloke nijara pichaphale ubhati yoraa arau nurara sandhana karaagai’. Tara pichata ubhayara majata sthapana ha’ba eta praacira, ya’ta eta duraara thakiba, yara bhitarata thakiba rahamata arau bahirata thakiba sasti

Munaphikasakale muminasakalaka mati ka’ba, ‘ami tomalokara lagata nachilone? Te'omloke ka’ba, ‘haya, kintu tomaloke nije'i nijaka bipadagrasta karaicha arau tomaloke pratiksa karaichila arau sandeha karaichila arau micha akanksa'i tomalokaka prataraita karai raakhichila, arau arasesata allahara nirdesa ahi ga’la, arau (antima samayalaike) mahapratarake tomalokaka allaha samparke prataraita karaichila’

‘Eteke aji tomalokara paraa kono muktipana grahana karaa naha’ba arau yisakale kupharai karaichila sihamtara paraa'o nahaya. Jahanname'i tomalokara abasasthala, e'itorae'i tomalokara upayukta sthana; arau kimana ye nikrsta e'i pratyabartanasthala

yisakale imana aniche te'omlokara hrdaya allahara smaranata arau yi satya aratirna haiche tara babe te'omlokara antara pami yoraara samaya horaa na'ine? Arau te'omloke yate sihamtara darae nahaya, yihamtaka iyara agata kitaba diya haichila-- tara pichata bahu kala atibahita horaara pichata sihamtara antarasamuha kathora hai paraichila; arau sihamtara adhikansa'i phachikba
Jani thoraa ye, allahe'i prthiraika tara mrtyura pichata punarjiraita karae. Ami nidarsanasamuha tomalokara babe suspastabharae barnana karaicho yate tomaloke bujiba paraa

Niscaya danasila purausa arau danasila narai arau yisakale allahaka uttama rna diye, te'omlokaka (iyara paraibarte) bahu guna brd'dhi karai diya ha’ba arau te'omlokara babe ache sanmanajanaka puraskara

Arau yisakale allaha arau te'omra raachulara prati imana ane, te'omloke'i nija pratipalakara ocarata chiddikba arau sbahida (buli bibecita). Te'omlokara babe ache te'omlokara praapya puraskara arau nura; arau yisakale kupharai karaiche arau amara nidarsanasamuha asbikara karaiche, sihamte'i jahannamara adhibasi

Jani thoraa ye, niscaya prthiraira jirana khela-dhemali, kraira-kautuka, saundarya, arau tomalokara parasparaika gaurara-ahankara, dhana-sampada arau santana-santatita praacurya labhara pratiyogitara bahirae ana eko nahaya. Iyara udaharana haiche barasunara darae, yara dbaraa utpanna sasya-sambharae krsakasakalaka anandita karae, tara pichata se'ibora suka'i yaya, tetiya tumi se'iboraka haladhiya baranata dekhibalai poraa, arasesata se'ibora khera-kutata parainata haya; arau akhiraatata ache kathina sasti arau allahara magaphiraata o santusti; arau prthiraira jirana prataranara bahirae ana eko nahaya

Tomaloke nija pratipalakara ksama arau se'i jannata labhara prayasata pratiyogitata aratirna horaa, yara prasastata akasa arau prthiraira prasastatara darae, yito prastuta karaa haiche se'isakala lokara babe yisakale allaha arau te'omra raachulara prati imana ane. E'ito allahara anugraha, te'om yaka iccha take'i e'ito pradana karae; arau allaha maha anugrahasila
Prthiraita arau tomalokara oparata apatita horaa ene kono bipada-apada na'i yito ami seya sanghatita horaara agate ekhana kitapata lipibad'dha karai rakha na'i. Niscaya allahara pakse eya ati sahaja

E'ito e'i babe ye, yate tomaloke yi heraa'icha tara prati paraitapa nakaraa arau te'om tomalokaka yi pradana karaiche tara babe utphullita nohoraa. Karana allahe kono ud'dhata arau ahankarai byaktika pachanda nakarae
Yihamte krpanata karae arau manuhaka krpanatara nirdesa diye, arau yiye mukha ghuraa'i laya (si jani loraa ucita) niscaya allaha abharamukta, cira prasansita

Niscaya ami amara raachulasakalaka suspasta pramana sahakarae praerana karaicho, arau te'omlokara lagata dicho kitaba arau n'yayara manadanda, yate manuhe subicara pratistha karae. Ami arau aratirna karaicho loha, ya’ta ache pracanda sakti arau manuhara babe ache bahubidha kalyana. Eya e'i babe'i ye, yate allahe prakasa karai diye ye, kone gayeba arasthata te'omka arau te'omra raachulaka sahaya karae. Niscaya allaha mahasaktimana, paraakramasali

Arau niscaya ami nuha arau ibraahimaka raachularaupe praerana karaichilo arau ami te'omlokara bansadharasakalara babe sthira karaichilo nabu'oraata arau kitaba. Kintu sihamtara kichumanehe satpatha aralambana karaichila arau sihamtara adhikansa'i achila phachikba

Iyara pichata ami te'omlokara anugami hicape amara raachulasakalaka praerana karaichilo arau marayama putra ichako anugami karaichilo, arau te'omka ami dichilo injila arau te'omra anusaraisakalara antarata dichilo karauna arau daya; arau bairaagyabada—e'ito sihamte nije'i allahara santustira babe prarartana karaichila. Ami e'ito sihamtara oparata lipibad'dha karaa nachilo; athaca e'ito'o sihamte yathayathabharae palana karaa na'i. Kintu sihamtara majata yisakale imana anichila, sihamtaka ami sihamtara puraskara pradana karaichilo; kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i achila phachikba

He imandarasakala! Tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau te'omra raachulara prati imana ana. Te'om nija anugrahata tomalokaka dbiguna puraskara pradana karaiba arau te'om tomalokaka pradana karaiba nura, yara sahayata tomaloke caliba paraiba arau te'om tomalokaka ksama karaiba; arau allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu

Eya e'i babe'i ye, yate ahale kitabasakale janiba parae ye, allahara saman'yatama anugrahato sihamtara kono adhikara na'i; arau niscaya anugraha allaharae'i hatata, yaka iccha te'om taka pradana karae, arau allaha maha anugrahasila
